New Records: USA set a target of 110 which was chased down by India with 10 balls to spare
Key Match Events: Shayan Jahangir was out to the first ball of the game, trapped LBW by Arshdeep Singh
Virat Kohli was dismissed for a golden duck by Saurabh Netravalkar
Rohit Sharma was dismissed by Harmeet Singh
Nitish Kumar scored 27 runs from 23 balls
Saurabh Netravalkar conceded just 18 runs across his four overs
Miscellaneous Highlights: The U.S. could still qualify for the next round despite the defeat
A rained-off game or a win in their final group match against Ireland on Friday would guarantee their passage
Heavy rain is expected over the next few days in Florida
Others: The match was played in New York, and the U.S. team made a 1,300-mile trip down the east coast to face Ireland at Central Broward Park & Broward County Stadium in Lauderhill, on the outskirts of Miami, on Friday
